About the Company: Ion Exchange India pioneered water treatment in India and is today the country`s premier company in water and environment management, with a strong international presence. Formed in 1964, as a subsidiary of the Permutit Company of UK, it became a wholly Indian company in 1985 when Permutit divested their holding. It currently employ 1,000 people - multi-disciplinary teams of highly experienced professional managers technologists and scientists, supported by a widespread infrastructure in India and abroad..The company also in the business activities of Chemicals, Engineering, Consumer Products.
